sentence.Network_cn: 吉米·杜兰特的滑稽表演令人捧腹.

sentence.Network_en: He insists over and over that his task is not buffoonery, but teaching ( or even preaching ).
sentence.Network_cn: 他再三坚持说他的工作不是谐谑而是教导 ( 甚至是说教 ).

sentence.Network_en: It can take innumerable forms, from buffoonery to the pursuit of posthumous fame.
sentence.Network_cn: 它可以有无数表现形式, 从插科打挥到追求死后的名声.
